scripts.alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha -ws && git add . && git commit -m "alpha: prerelease" && npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && git push
scripts.fix: npm version patch -ws && git add . && git commit -m "fix: patch" && npm version patch && git push
scripts.feature: npm version minor -ws && git add . && git commit -m "feature: minor" && npm version minor && git push
scripts.breaking: npm version major -ws && git add . && git commit -m "breaking: major" && npm version major && git push
